title: FS J.J.K Copyart 1950- 1956 Jackie Robinson PC back
author: bigfanNY

posts.post_title: FS J.J.K Copyart 1950- 1956 Jackie Robinson PC back
posts.post_content: Nice example. Looks like it was mounted in a scrapbook and the back is why it is a PSA 1. But it is an Outstanding display item. Asking $450 shipped in USA.
